short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly navigate to Chrome's downloads page with a single click. Save time and easily manage your downloads!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick access button to the download page

Quickly access the downloads window  by clicking the icon instead of taking the "long way" (Tools/Downloads).

Very useful for those who download a lot.
